name: The Cold-Blooded Warrior
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: Han Jaewoo is a sweat in the world-famous game &quotSavior Of Humanity.&quot Once a hardcore player, now drowning in debt in his tiny room. His long-awaited showdown with a demon lord ends in an unexpected failure. The debt collectors are closing in... and all that&#039s left to him are despair and stubborn grit. That&#039s when Aquila, the administrator, appears with an offer: &quotDon&#039t you want to see it? The true happy ending of this game...&quot With a prize of 25 million dollars on the
